column4: can anyone help me to set minimize animation in ccsm. I'm running ubuntu 11.04.
what do you want?
i'm trying to set minimize animation in ccsm. But it is'n working. Open and close animations are working
try to change the time setting for minimize. Which effect you want?
it is'n taking the effect at all. i click on new and then set all the settings and when i click on close. It is'n taking it.
try the on with geany (something similar) effect and see if it works? On which machine are you?
ubuntu 11.04
with 11.04 no problem. Try to change the effect and its timing . Try different effects. And do one refresh or logout
if still not working then there is some big issue. but it should not be there
http://dev.collabshot.com/show/64c902/
looking at it...
After i select new and set all the settings it still remains blank. it is'n taking the effect at all.
is there any preconfigured effect?
usually there are
OK so no preconfigured effect... ummm try #compiz you will find help there
very strange
thanks for your help
I was unable to help....
but you were kind enough to have a look at it. that was nice of you
try default irc for apps . like for compiz #compiz for qwn #awn and so on. There you can find expert help.
